text:
@realDonaldTrump @SecretarySonny @ZippyDuvall All the corrupt trump regime had to do in response to the covid19 pandemic was:
1. Take it seriously & implement #TestAndTrace measures
2. Shut down hot spots immediately
3. Ensure health & economic care for EVERYONE!
But trump’s a hateful mite!
